leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

tools.name: BiGMeC
tools.one_line_profile: Biosynthetic Gene cluster Metabolic pathway Constructor
tools.detailed_description: BiGMeC is a tool designed to construct metabolic pathways from Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs), facilitating the functional analysis of secondary metabolites in microbial genomes.

tools.name: lsaBGC
tools.one_line_profile: Lineage Specific Analysis of Biosynthetic Gene Clusters
tools.detailed_description: lsaBGC is a bioinformatics suite for performing lineage-specific analysis of biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs), enabling evolutionary and functional insights into secondary metabolism across related genomes.

tools.name: pb-metagenomics-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools and pipelines for PacBio HiFi metagenomics data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and pipelines specifically tailored for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi reads in metagenomics, covering tasks from taxonomic profiling to assembly and binning.

tools.name: DRAM
tools.one_line_profile: Distilled and Refined Annotation of Metabolism
tools.detailed_description: DRAM is a tool for the annotation and curation of function for microbial and viral genomes, providing a summary of metabolic potential to facilitate the interpretation of metagenomic data.

tools.name: pyrodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to Prodigal gene predictor
tools.detailed_description: Pyrodigal provides Cython bindings and a Python interface to Prodigal, a highly popular ORF finder for genomes and metagenomes, enabling efficient gene prediction within Python workflows.

tools.name: antiSMASH
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotics and Secondary Metabolite Analysis Shell
tools.detailed_description: antiSMASH is a comprehensive pipeline for the identification, annotation, and analysis of biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) in bacterial and fungal genomes, widely used for secondary metabolite discovery.

tools.name: distillR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for distilling and summarizing functional annotations of microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to filter, summarize, and visualize functional annotation data (e.g., from KEGG, Pfam) for bacterial genomes and metagenomes, facilitating the interpretation of large-scale functional profiles.

tools.name: prodigal-gv
tools.one_line_profile: Gene prediction tool optimized for giant viruses and alternative genetic codes
tools.detailed_description: A fork of the Prodigal gene prediction software, specifically tuned to address the complexities of gene calling in giant viruses (NCLDV) and viruses utilizing alternative genetic codes.

tools.name: RGI
tools.one_line_profile: Resistance Gene Identifier for predicting resistomes from genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A software tool used to predict antibiotic resistance genes (resistomes) from protein or nucleotide data, including metagenomics data, utilizing the Comprehensive Antibiotic Resistance Database (CARD).

tools.name: run_dbcan (V5)
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Carbohydrate-active enzyme (CAZyme) annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: The standalone tool for dbCAN V5, designed to annotate Carbohydrate-active enzymes (CAZymes) in genomes and metagenomes using HMMER, DIAMOND, and CGC finding.

tools.name: HUMAnN
tools.one_line_profile: Profiling presence/absence and abundance of microbial pathways in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: HUMAnN (HMP Unified Metabolic Analysis Network) is a pipeline for efficiently and accurately profiling the abundance of microbial metabolic pathways and other molecular functions from metagenomic or metatranscriptomic sequencing data.

tools.name: micronota
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating microbial genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, BSD-licensed pipeline for the structural and functional annotation of microbial genomes and metagenomic assemblies, integrating various tools for high-quality annotation.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: A specialized pipeline designed for the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic genomes recovered from metagenomic datasets (MAGs), addressing the specific challenges of eukaryotic gene prediction.

tools.name: MicrobeAnnotator
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metabolic annotation of microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly pipeline for the comprehensive metabolic annotation of microbial genomes and metagenomes, utilizing an iterative search approach with KOfam, UniProt, and RefSeq databases.

tools.name: InterProScan
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-scale protein function classification tool
tools.detailed_description: The standard tool for scanning protein sequences against the InterPro database's member databases (including Pfam, TIGRFAMs, etc.) to predict protein families, domains, and sites.

tools.name: InterProScan 6
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow-based implementation of InterProScan
tools.detailed_description: A scalable, cloud-ready implementation of the InterProScan protein function classification tool, built using the Nextflow workflow manager for improved parallelization and deployment.

tools.name: eggNOG-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Fast genome-wide functional annotation through orthology assignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast functional annotation of novel sequences (genes or proteins) using precomputed orthologous groups and phylogenies from the eggNOG database, providing high-precision orthology assignments.

tools.name: BRICK
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for bacterial genome annotations and comparisons
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool that creates interactive, BRIG-like circular visualizations for bacterial genomes, allowing for the display of annotations, coverage, and comparative genomic data.

tools.name: clinker
tools.one_line_profile: Gene cluster comparison figure generator
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for generating interactive, publication-quality figures comparing gene clusters (BGCs), automatically performing alignments and visualizing structural similarities.

tools.name: dnaapler
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for reorienting assembled microbial sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to identify the replication origin (dnaA) in bacterial chromosomal assemblies and reorient the sequence to begin at the origin, standardizing genome assemblies for downstream analysis.

tools.name: MetaPathways
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for constructing Pathway/Genome Databases from environmental sequences
tools.detailed_description: A modular pipeline for analyzing metagenomic data, performing quality control, ORF prediction, and functional annotation to construct Pathway/Genome Databases (PGDBs) compatible with Pathway Tools.

tools.name: Prodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard software for microbial gene prediction (CDS calling), widely used in pipelines for annotating bacteria and archaea genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: KEGGaNOG
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mining KEGG pathways completeness from eggNOG-mapper annotations
tools.detailed_description: A utility to analyze the output of eggNOG-mapper and calculate the completeness of KEGG metabolic pathways, helping to infer functional capabilities of microbial communities.

tools.name: PPanGGOLiN
tools.one_line_profile: Partitioned pangenome graph construction and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for building and analyzing partitioned pangenome graphs from large sets of microbial genomes, enabling the study of gene families and their genomic context.

tools.name: run_dbcan (V4)
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone tool for CAZyme annotation (dbCAN V4)
tools.detailed_description: The standalone implementation of the dbCAN V4 pipeline for automated Carbohydrate-active enzyme (CAZyme) annotation in genomic and metagenomic sequences.

tools.name: BiG-SLiCE
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable analysis of Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs)
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the large-scale clustering and analysis of Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs), capable of processing massive datasets to identify gene cluster families and explore their diversity.

tools.name: Meteor
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative metagenomics profiling platform for complex ecosystems
tools.detailed_description: Meteor is a platform for quantitative metagenomics profiling that relies on gene catalogues to perform species-level taxonomic profiling, functional analysis, and strain-level population structure inference.

tools.name: MicFunPred
tools.one_line_profile: Functional profile prediction from 16S rRNA sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A conserved approach to predict functional profiles from 16S rRNA sequence data, enabling functional inference from taxonomic marker genes.

tools.name: mcmcstat
tools.one_line_profile: MCMC toolbox for Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox for Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulation, widely used for statistical inference and parameter estimation in scientific modeling.

tools.name: AMRFinderPlus
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of AMR, virulence, and stress resistance genes
tools.detailed_description: AMRFinderPlus identifies antimicrobial resistance (AMR) genes, point mutations, virulence factors, and stress resistance genes in assembled bacterial nucleotide and protein sequences.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and binning pipeline for metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomes, facilitating the reconstruction of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: omixer-rpmR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for metagenomic pathway mapping
tools.detailed_description: An R interface to the omixer-rpm tool, designed to turn metagenomic functional profiles into pathway or module profiles for functional analysis.

tools.name: Bakta
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid and standardized annotation of bacterial genomes and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the rapid and standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs, and plasmids, designed to be a successor to Prokka with improved database handling.

tools.name: orthosnake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for orthology inference
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow script that integrates Prokka and OrthoFinder for automated orthology inference in comparative genomics.

tools.name: BlastViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive viewer for BLAST results
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool for visualizing and analyzing BLAST (Basic Local Alignment Search Tool) results, aiding in the interpretation of sequence alignment data.

tools.name: plantiSMASH
tools.one_line_profile: Mining biosynthetic gene clusters in plant genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool adapted from antiSMASH to explore and predict potential Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs) specifically within plant genomes.

tools.name: omixer-rpm
tools.one_line_profile: Reference Pathways Mapper for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping metagenomic functional profiles into pathway or module profiles, enabling high-level functional interpretation of microbiome data.

tools.name: pgp_reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Pathway-Guided Pruning for metabolic model reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Implements a Pathway-Guided Pruning (PGP) approach for the reconstruction of genome-scale metabolic models, aiding in systems biology modeling.

tools.name: tcga-microbiome-prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer prognosis prediction using tumor microbial abundances
tools.detailed_description: Predictive models and analysis scripts for cancer prognosis and drug response using primary tumor microbial abundances derived from WGS and RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ARIBA
tools.one_line_profile: Antimicrobial Resistance Identification By Assembly
tools.detailed_description: ARIBA identifies antimicrobial resistance genes by running local assemblies from paired-end sequencing reads, suitable for bacterial pathogen analysis.

tools.name: gff3toembl
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Prokka GFF3 to EMBL format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert GFF3 files generated by Prokka into EMBL format, facilitating the submission of annotated assemblies to databases like EBI.

tools.name: ShotMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Shotgun Metagenome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the annotation of shotgun metagenomic data, enabling functional and taxonomic characterization of microbial communities.

tools.name: pprodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized wrapper for Prodigal gene predictor
tools.detailed_description: A Python3 wrapper that parallelizes the execution of Prodigal, a popular prokaryotic gene prediction tool, to speed up analysis of large datasets.

tools.name: autoprokka
tools.one_line_profile: Automated batch invocation of Prokka
tools.detailed_description: A script to automatically invoke Prokka on a directory of FASTA genomes and organize the output, streamlining batch genome annotation.

tools.name: EcoFoldDB
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for structure-guided metagenome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A database and pipeline for protein structure-guided annotations of ecologically relevant functions at the metagenome scale.

tools.name: PGPg_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation of Plant-Growth Promotion Genes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool offering workflows for the annotation of Plant-Growth Promotion Genes (PGPg) in genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: Prokka
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid prokaryotic genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A widely used software tool for the rapid annotation of prokaryotic genomes, integrating multiple prediction tools into a single workflow.

tools.name: DRAMPower
tools.one_line_profile: DRAM power and energy estimation tool
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate tool for estimating power and energy consumption of DRAM memories, used in computer architecture research and hardware simulation.

tools.name: DRAMSys
tools.one_line_profile: SystemC TLM-2.0 based DRAM simulator
tools.detailed_description: A flexible DRAM subsystem simulator based on SystemC TLM-2.0, allowing for the exploration of DRAM architectures and controllers.

tools.name: DRAMSim2
tools.one_line_profile: Cycle accurate DRAM simulator
tools.detailed_description: A cycle-accurate memory system simulator for DDR2/DDR3 memory systems, widely used in computer architecture research.

tools.name: DRAMsim3
tools.one_line_profile: Cycle-accurate, Thermal-Capable DRAM Simulator
tools.detailed_description: The successor to DRAMSim2, adding support for newer memory standards (HBM, HMC) and thermal modeling capabilities.

tools.name: StrainPanDA
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruction of subspecies composition and functional profiles
tools.detailed_description: A method for the reconstruction of subspecies composition and functional profiles from metagenomic data, utilizing pangenome graphs.

tools.name: Cayman
tools.one_line_profile: Profiling CAZyme abundances in metagenomic datasets
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for profiling Carbohydrate-Active Enzyme (CAZyme) abundances in metagenomic datasets, essential for understanding carbon metabolism.

tools.name: MultiSMASH
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for large-scale antiSMASH analyses
tools.detailed_description: A workflow and collection of scripts designed to facilitate large-scale analyses using antiSMASH, a tool for identifying biosynthetic gene clusters.
